title: Example Tool
description: This is an example of a tool with all the possible options.
featured_description: This is a longer description of the example tool. It can be used to provide more details about the tool and its features.

title: Chat with a Doc
description: AI-powered Q&A over your own documents with intelligent search and citations.
featured_description: Transform how you interact with documents. Upload PDFs, DOCX files, or URLs and have intelligent conversations with their content using advanced AI-powered search and real-time citations.

title: Voice Notes
description: Record and manage voice notes easily in your browser with a clean, intuitive interface.
featured_description: Capture your thoughts instantly with our browser-based voice recording tool. Perfect for quick notes, reminders, and voice memos with seamless playback and management.

title: 3D Model Viewer
description: Interactively view and manipulate 3D models directly in your browser with advanced controls.

title: Live Audio Transcription
description: Transcribe spoken audio into text in real-time with high accuracy and timestamps.

title: VideoGen YouTube Channel
description: Explore AI-generated video content and cutting-edge experiments on our official channel.

title: AV Recorder
description: Easily record audio and video from your browser with professional quality output.

title: Image Classification
description: Zero-shot image classification using advanced AI models for instant object recognition.

title: Device Analyzer
description: Comprehensive system and performance analysis tool for your device capabilities.

title: Code Structure Realizer
description: Visualize and analyze your codebase structure with interactive diagrams and insights.

title: Favicon Generator
description: Create custom favicons for your website with multiple formats and sizes.
